snippet: Amid a failed coup attempt and armed attacks on independent radio stations, protesters fear free expression could be curtailed sharply in Burundi.
lead_paragraph: Amid a failed coup attempt and armed attacks on independent radio stations, protesters fear free expression could be curtailed sharply in Burundi.

headline.print_headline: Opposition Activists in Burundi Fear Crackdown After President’s Return
headline.main: Opposition Activists in Burundi Fear Crackdown After President’s Return
